channel.title: Change exp rates
channel.description: Can someone explain to me how i can change xp rates please? Im new to this..

item.title: Change exp rates
item.dc:creator: @iamminesmith iamminesmith
item.description:
@iamminesmith wrote:

that is the corect way, the easiest way is to log into the server and find out the current exp rate, go into the client.java, and press control+F, and search for the current exp rate. next just change the rate to what you would like it to be

Read full topic

item.title: Change exp rates

Read full topic

item.title: Change exp rates
item.dc:creator: @tb1 tb
item.description:
@tb1 wrote:

deathschaos9:

In client.java search for hitdiff there should be a number beside it, that would be numhitdiff. Edit that number to your desiered exp rate for combat stats only. Keep doing this until you are out of hitdiffs. To change the exp rate of skills, simply look for addSkillExp in clickingmost and client.java and change the ammount.

FINALLY thank you for your help, that sounds like its correct. Its like people rarely help in this section at all, thank you for helping me.

Read full topic

item.title: Change exp rates
item.dc:creator: @Pure_Demons Pure Demons
item.description:
@Pure_Demons wrote:

tb:

Can someone explain to me how i can change xp rates please? Im new to this…

I would say check your client.java or something for Skill IDs, here’s a list:

playerLevel[0] = Attack
playerLevel[1] = Defence
playerLevel[2] = Strength
playerLevel[3] = Hitpoints
playerLevel[4] = Range
playerLevel[5] = Prayer
playerLevel[6] = Magic
playerLevel[7] = Cooking
playerLevel[8] = WoodCutting
playerLevel[9] = Fletching
playerLevel[10] = Fishing
playerLevel[11] = Firemaking
playerLevel[12] = Crafting
playerLevel[13] = Smithing
playerLevel[14] = Mining
playerLevel[15] = Herblore
playerLevel[16] = Agility
playerLevel[17] = Thieving
playerLevel[18] = Slayer
playerLevel[19] = Farming
playerLevel[20] = Runecrafting

Read full topic
